website_summaries.verdict: Made by a reliable brand, this quality suitcase comes with a matching backpack that could also be used at school.
pros: Handle is a fine size for kids
Can take a beating through the airport
cons: Suitcase does not include interior pockets

customer_reviews.title: I love this suitcase...
customer_reviews.text: ... But as many others have said, the backpack insert is a little disappointing. It actually does take away from the extended carry-on luggage size, so I ended up carrying my own backpack and this suitcase for a week-long trip, and I was able to fit everything I needed and even had room to spare - so I brought an extra pair of shoes, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel luggage if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our two boys who are 4 and 2. We took this luggage for a trip to India. The backpack was perfect to carry-on toys, iPads, and things for us. It is separated into two zipped compartments so there was clear separation of toys. Every parent knows what I am talking about. The Spinner is excellent. It carried everything we needed for the boys for an 8 day trip. It is durable and the Falcon is awesome on the outside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dev Batra

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy luggage
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching for hard sided luggage, and this one fit the bill. It’s very sturdy and has plenty of room inside, the backpack is ok, nothing to be desired but overall, well worth the money I paid for sturdiness and Ease of knowing I got my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a kid's set, but it's just carry-on size and the handle extends to an adult size, so if your husband were to want it instead of giving it to the kids, hypothetically speaking, it would be fine to use. It's a solid hard-size luggage piece with four wheels. Rolling it empty is good, but with items inside on airport carpet or tiles is very smooth and easy to turn. Soft-sided pack is a nice expansion option for when they're coming home from Grandpa's with extra gifts. Hypothetically speaking. The only objection I have is the price. Yikes.
customer_reviews.author: Readerly

customer_reviews.title: Yowsa was this a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Needless to say, this went over with a big bang. They loved it. We gave the larger one to the older boy and smaller to the younger girl. The listing pix actually cover it quite well so I won't duplicate. I can say that they're really sturdy and feel like good quality materials. This was a fun partnership idea and I think it worked out very well. Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - It's an Amazon program where many everyday things you buy will generate a small donation from Amazon to the charity of your choice. Info here:
customer_reviews.author: 🌈 KT

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a hard side suitcase for awhile and since my tween is about to go on an international trip, this was perfect timing! Make sure that your items don't get extra squished and jostled while going through the rigors of multiple plane transfers. The suitcase turns on a dime. I'm a little concerned with the external wheels--which means that they are at risk of being broken off, but that's the tradeoff for the extra maneuverability. the suitcase is super lightweight. And there's a zipper through the middle for expanding its depth.
customer_reviews.author: LawyerMom

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: My son is taking the family on a trip and I knew they would love this American Tourister Kids' Star Wars Falcon Perfect Packer. They’re all Star Wars fans. Of course, the boys fought over the suitcase and my son threatened to keep it for himself. This bag can be a carry-on, but the super cool design will help identify the suitcase if they decide to check it. The case is sturdy and will withstand any rough handling at the airport. It’s got good wheels and plenty of room inside. The backpack is an added plus. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ocmd

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this.
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. We just used it on a series of trips via airlines and they performed perfectly. Very lightweight when empty, but durable. The rollers worked great, and it was easy for a 6 year old to roll off the plane and through the concourse. The roller has a zipper that allows you to expand it for more room, yet it still fit into the overhead bins on our Southwest airlines flights.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our 6 year old grandson! Carry on size makes it even better. Sturdy, well-built, and still looks perfect for a kid. The wheels make it so easy for our little guy to pull it himself. The backpack part can help organize the suitcase or you can carry it separately. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Children's Luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece of luggage for children. Right size for someone 7-12 years of age. Well made and really rolls easily. Grandkids 8 and 12 argued for this one. Don't know about durability yet but they're heading for Germany this summer so we'll update on return. On the surface its a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: Super High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome piece of luggage. It's a nice hard case that will keep things protected, and the design is absolutely awesome. It is so slick looking. The print is clear and really fashionable. Honestly, it's great for kids or adults. It's just an epic carryon for Star Wars fans!
customer_reviews.author: Dipped in Ink

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this expandable hard shell rolling carry on! I got it for my son and he also loves it! Its cool but also.really functional and made well. The inside is stylish but functions well to hold things down. It has a baggage tag that opens with your address info.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

product_meta.title: American Tourister Kids' Star Wars Perfect Packer 2-Piece Luggage & Backpack Set, Black/Yellow, (BK/20)
product_meta.description: Color:Black/YellowThis Star Wars packable backpack conveniently fits into the Perfect Packer spinner carry-on for additional organization, or easily converts into a backpack for overnight excursions.
feature_bullets: SCRATCH-RESISTANT twill texture, keeping cases beautiful trip after trip
SPLIT CASE CONSTRUCTION with softside backpack nestled inside
FOUR MULTI-DIRECTIONAL SPINNER WHEELS for easy mobility, rolls upright so there is no weight on your arm or shoulder
STARS WARS Branded matching ID tag
CROSS STRAPS Secure the contents of your luggage to help prevent shifting that can cause damage, also help keep the contents of your luggage organized

10 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: American Tourister products are rigorously tested to ensure our products meet stringent standards. This set comes with a 10-year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.
2 PIECE SET contains: 20" Carry-On Packing Dimensions: 19.5" x 13.25" x 9". Overall Dimensions: 22.6" x 14.2" x 9.5", 6.83lbs. Backpack Dimensions: 19.25" x 13" x 8.5", 3.30lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
